metadata.description: There's a vampire preying on the citizens of Los Angeles - nothing new for Spike and company, right? Only one problem: the attacks are happening in broad daylight! As Spike and Angel try to track down the killer, Spike finds himself struggling with something even more unexpected - his own guilty conscience. Can Spike put aside the demons of his past in time to face the vamp feeding on L.A.? Written by Scott Tipton (Spike: Old Wounds), with art by Fernando Goni (Spike: Old Times, Spike: Old Wounds).
metadata.name: Spike: Lost and Found
